content: Why would someone not want control over markets closer to them (ie more influenced by their individual vote). In addition, the more local the control, the easier it is to vote with your feet. If citizens do not like that their crappy state will not cover maternity care, they can simply move to one that does. I am not pro crappy insurance. I am pro individual choice to insure the things you may need. After all, that is the definition of insurance.
